extendedInfo.description: People counter was developed in order to detect if there is any movement around or to count how many people enter or exit.The application features are listed below:- Detects the any kind of movement- Counts how many people enter or exit.- E-mails the total count information to your mobile or e-mail adress- Functions best in 240x320 resolution- Enables you to make sensibility settingsFor comments and suggestions:mail@kemalefendioglu.com

reviews.comment: Poor operaring start screen unable to set up
reviews.author: Amir Guezaiel
